main event: Mrs. B.C. observed a luminous object approximately the size of a basketball or volleyball hovering in the northern sky on 8 July 1961.
interesting points: The object emitted a pulsating white light,The object hovered and moved erratically for 3 to 5 minutes,The object disappeared rapidly straight up,No sound was heard during the sighting,The witness could not determine any specific shape or structure to the object.
sighted object: luminous object in the northern sky
